links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
maple: A060429:=n->4*ithprime(n)^2+1; seq(A060429(n), n=1..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Dec 17 2013
prog: (PARI) { n=0; forprime (p=1, 542, write("b060429.txt", n++, " ", 4*p^2 + 1); ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 05 2009
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Apr 06 2001
